hero.title: Welcome to
hero.name: Elephantio
hero.subtitle: This is a Web Development showcase built by Harun Al Rosyid. Featuring responsive, scalable web and mobile applications using React, React Native, and modern frontend tools.
techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.heading: Tools & Technologies I work with
techStack.subtitle: I leverage modern technologies to build robust, scalable, and user-friendly applications across web and mobile platforms.
clients.title: Clients & Projects
clients.heading: Companies I've worked with
clients.subtitle: I've had the privilege of working with these amazing companies and delivering impactful solutions.
clients.testimonial: Harun is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His technical expertise and problem-solving abilities have been invaluable to our projects.
creator.title: The Creator
creator.heading: Meet Harun Al Rosyid
creator.subtitle: The passionate developer behind Elephantio
creator.bio1: Harun Al Rosyid is a seasoned developer with over 5 years of experience in creating beautiful, functional web and mobile applications. With a passion for clean code and intuitive user experiences, Harun brings ideas to life through thoughtful design and robust implementation.
creator.bio2: Specializing in React, React Native, and modern JavaScript frameworks, Harun has worked across various industries including finance, e-commerce, and enterprise solutions. Elephantio represents his vision of creating showcase projects that demonstrate the possibilities of modern web development.
creator.achievement1.title: 5+ Years Experience
creator.achievement1.desc: In web and mobile development across multiple industries
creator.achievement2.title: 50+ Projects Completed
creator.achievement2.desc: From small business websites to enterprise applications
creator.achievement3.title: Team Leadership
creator.achievement3.desc: Successfully led development teams on multiple projects
services.title: Professional Services
services.heading: How I can help you
services.subtitle: I offer comprehensive development services tailored to your specific needs, with expertise in JavaScript-based technologies and rapid adaptation to new frameworks and tools.
services.web.title: Web Development
services.web.description: Custom web applications built with modern JavaScript frameworks, focusing on performance, responsiveness, and user experience.
services.mobile.title: Mobile Development
services.mobile.description: Native-like mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native, with seamless integration of device features.
services.fullstack.title: Full-Stack Solutions
services.fullstack.description: End-to-end development from database design to frontend implementation, creating cohesive and scalable applications.
services.consulting.title: Technical Consulting
services.consulting.description: Expert advice on architecture, technology selection, and implementation strategies for your development projects.
services.collaboration.heading: Ways to Work Together
services.collaboration.subtitle: I offer flexible collaboration options to best suit your project needs and timeline
services.collaboration.freelance.title: Project-Based
services.collaboration.freelance.descrip: Ideal for specific projects with defined scope and timeline, with clear deliverables and milestones.
services.collaboration.contract.title: Contract Work
services.collaboration.contract.descript: Dedicated development time for ongoing projects or extended collaboration with your team.
services.collaboration.employee.title: Full-Time Role
services.collaboration.employee.descript: Complete integration with your team as an employee for long-term projects and continuous development.
services.approach.heading: My Approach to Technology
services.approach.description: I believe in using the right tool for the job, with JavaScript as my primary ecosystem. I continuously learn and adapt to new technologies, ensuring your project benefits from modern best practices while maintaining stability and performance.
about.title: Professional Profile
about.heading: Delivering high-impact solutions
about.paragraph1: With over 5 years of experience in the software development industry, I specialize in designing and developing responsive, scalable web and mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.paragraph2: I've successfully led teams, managed project workflows, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-level applications in finance and distribution industries.
about.expertise.desc: React, React Native, Redux, TypeScript, and modern frontend development tools
about.industry.desc: Finance, Banking, FMCG, Retail, and IT Services sectors
